Classes¶

class bhp_appointment.classes.BaseAppointmentModelAdmin(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_model_admin.BaseModelAdmin

ModelAdmin subclass for models with a ForeignKey to ‘appointment’, such as your visit model(s).

In the child ModelAdmin class set the following attributes, for example:

visit_model_foreign_key = 'maternal_visit'
dashboard_type = 'maternal'

if you are tracking labs, also include a model that inherets from lab_requisition.models.BaseRequisition, e.g.:

requisition_model = MaternalRequisition
class bhp_appointment.admin.AppointmentAdmin(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bhp_base_model.classes.base_model_admin.BaseModelAdmin

ModelAdmin class to handle appointments.

formfield_for_foreignkey(db_field, request, **kwargs)[source]¶

Limits the dropdown for ‘registered_subject’

save_model(request, obj, form, change)[source]¶

Saves an appointment if handled through admin.

  1. On change, checks the window period using bhp_visit.classes.WindowPeriod and warns if out.
  2. If new, sets the visit ‘instance’ to ‘0’ or one plus the max.
